title: NFIB/CA Opposes City of Sacramento Minimum Wage Increase (NFIB - National Federation of Independent Business) ...
text: ( Source : NFIB - National Federation of Independent Business ) NFIB/CA Executive Director Tom Scott issued the following statement today regarding the recommendation of the City of Sacramento Task Force to raise the minimum wage to $12 .50 per
